about_the_game:
Step back in time with TrainCraft, the retro-style game that puts you in the driver's seat of a bustling railway operation. As the chief engineer, it's up to you to plan and execute the perfect train routes, avoid delays and keep your trains running on schedule.

Experience the thrill of managing a complex network of tracks and delivery of goods. Plan your routes wisely to pick up and deliver goods and passengers, all while trying to keep on schedule. Manage resources and population to build thriving outposts and cities ...

With retro-style graphics and a nostalgic chip tune soundtrack, Train Logistics is a game that will transport you back to the golden age of railroading. If you're a fan of strategy and simulation games, or just love trains, then TrainCraft is the perfect game for you. Download now and take control of your own railway empire!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM

short_description: A nostalgic, retro train management game.
